subject: p11474065
History: Evaluation of the patient after bronchoscopy and biopsy on the right.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to fluoroscopic spot views. Current AP radiograph of the chest demonstrates no evidence of pneumothorax. Right basal opacities are demonstrated most likely representing a combination of known nodular process, consolidation and post-procedure atelectasis. No interval development of pleural effusion is demonstrated.
